LanguageData.AK_Interaction_Ifrit.label: TALKING_ABOUT_IFRIT
LanguageData.AK_Interaction_Ifrit.logRulesInitiator.r: r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] 和 [RECIPIENT_nameDef] 就伊芙利特的未來 [AK_TALK_LFRIT_ACTION]。
